page.description: Deletes one or more record(s) in a table that match the filter condition
page.prototype: Delete_Count as N = record_delete(C tablename ,C filter )

argument.name: tablename
argument.description: The name of a table. The extension ".dbf" is assumed.

argument.name: filter
argument.description: A character filter expression that evaluates to a logical value and selects records from the table.

page.discussion: RECORD_DELETE() deletes one or more records in a table that match a Record_Filter.
